title: K-On!!: Keikaku!
synopsis: The summer holidays are coming to an end, but the girls from Houkago Tea Time want to take one more trip before their next semester starts. With countless travel destinations to choose from and as many preferences as there are club members, coming to an agreement seems far-flung.
characters: ['Hirasawa, Yui', 'Akiyama, Mio', 'Nakano, Azusa', 'Kotobuki, Tsumugi', 'Tainaka, Ritsu', 'Hirasawa, Ui', 'Yamanaka, Sawako', 'Manabe, Nodoka', 'Tainaka, Satoshi']
